definition: palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield

sentences.english: Palm-hitting, the anterior fontanelle of the vertex and Baihui.
sentences.chinese: 掌擊法常用於頭頂前囟與百會。

sentences.english: The impatient teacher slapped the student.
sentences.chinese: 這位不耐煩的老師掌擊了學生。

sentences.english: Palm - hitting , the anterior fontanelle of the vertex and Baihui.
sentences.chinese: 掌擊法常用於頭頂前囟與百會。

sentences.english: The impatient teacher slapped the student; a gunshot slapped him on the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 這位不耐煩的老師掌擊着學生。
